extendedInfo.description: This application allows selective coloring to give black and white photos a Dash of Color. We kept the user interface and features simple, yet intuitive, to give users exactly what they wanted when giving their images a little spunk. Choose any image and Dash of Color will convert it to a black and white image. You can begin painting in color right away with your fingers. Don't worry about mistakes, this application keeps track of every single step from the moment you selected which picture to edit. You can undo every step along the way! Choose your brush size and paint in either color or black & white to edit your photos in detail.FEATURES:â Simple, yet refined user interfaceâ Undo (saves your every move from the very beginning)â Paint in colorâ Paint in black & white (to erase)â Choose brush size

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No instructions and doesn\'t work anyway!
reviews.comment: Thought this\'d be a good for editing photos-WRONG! First, there are no instructions so there\'s no way of knowing what to do or how to do it. Second, there doesn\'t seem to be any way to change the size or orientation of the photo, or zoom in/out. Third, it doesn\'t appear to be possible to change the brush size/stroke or the colour! Fourth, error messages come up each time you try to save or exit (not that there is anything worth saving anyway)! Finally, after a few minutes the app force closes! #uninstall
reviews.author: Linda Burton

reviews.comment: WORST!! Does nothing but force close. Don\'t waste time w/this app. Ugh droid
